meanings.def: the place believed to be the home of God where good people go when they die, sometimes imagined to be in the sky
examples: the kingdom of heaven
I feel like I've died and gone to heaven.
in heaven I told her Daddy was in heaven with God.
Our child seemed a gift from heaven.

meanings.def: a place or situation in which you are very happy
examples: This isn't exactly my idea of heaven!
in heaven Shopping is my favourite pastime, so I was in heaven.
it is heaven doing something It was heaven being away from the office for a week.
The island is truly a heaven on earth.
heaven for somebody Tasmania is heaven for hikers and campers.
It was sheer heaven being alone at last.
The kids were in absolute heaven at the fair.
Four tall trees stretched up to the heavens.

meanings.def: used to emphasize what you are saying when you are surprised, shocked or annoyed
examples: God, what a stupid thing to do!

meanings.def: used to say that you hope that something will not happen
examples: ‘Maybe you'll end up as a lawyer, like me.’ ‘God forbid!’

meanings.def: used to say that you are afraid somebody will be in danger or that something bad will happen to them
examples: God help us if this doesn't work.

meanings.def: used to emphasize that you do not know something
examples: God knows what else they might find.
‘Where are they?’ ‘Goodness knows.’

meanings.def: used to emphasize the truth of what you are saying
examples: She ought to pass the exam—goodness knows she's been working hard enough.

meanings.def: used to say that you are frightened of the idea of something happening
examples: Heaven forfend that students are encouraged to think!

meanings.def: used to show that you are surprised or annoyed
examples: Good heavens, what are you doing?
All at once the heavens opened and everyone rushed for cover.

meanings.def: used especially in questions to show that you are angry, surprised or shocked
examples: What in God's name was that noise?
Where in the name of Heaven have you been?
Now that he's been promoted he's in seventh heaven.
Everyone thought that theirs was a marriage made in heaven.

meanings.def: to do everything you possibly can in order to achieve something
to have a strong unpleasant smell
to seem to be very dishonest or morally unacceptable
used to say that you are pleased about something
examples: Thank God you're safe!
‘Thank goodness for that!’ she said with a sigh of relief.
Thank heavens I've found my keys.

meanings.def: used after a verb to emphasize a particular hope, wish, etc.
examples: I wish to God you'd learn to pay attention!
